channel.title: [PI] How to change home teleport
channel.description: Iv'e already changed the home newcomer spawn to lumby, but when they click the "home" teleport it teleports them to the old home, how to I change this to teleport them to lumbridge? And on all spellbooks?

item.title: [PI] How to change home teleport
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

You say that but i had same probelm, i changed the edgeville coords and it worked so -.-

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to change home teleport
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Actually you sirs are wrong -.-…

Heres what you edit:

/**
 * Glory
 */
public static final int EDGEVILLE_X = ####; New teleport coordinates here. X
public static final int EDGEVILLE_Y = ####; New teleport coordinates here. Y
public static final String EDGEVILLE = "";
public static final int AL_KHARID_X = 3293;
public static final int AL_KHARID_Y = 3174;
public static final String AL_KHARID = "";
public static final int KARAMJA_X = 3087;
public static final int KARAMJA_Y = 3500;
public static final String KARAMJA = "";
public static final int MAGEBANK_X = 2538;
public static final int MAGEBANK_Y = 4716;
public static final String MAGEBANK = "";

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to change home teleport
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“Lord Typhis, post:5, topic:363941”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=460181.msg3366688#msg3366688 date=1286843276]
You have to go to Config.Java if I remember off the top of my head.
[/quote]

I have Checked config.java, I’m asking where do I change it? There is no “Home” teleport interface.[/quote]

Are you describing the Home button?
If so: Search the coords of the old home and replace it with the new home

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to change home teleport
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You have to go to Config.Java to change the Teleport when first logging in.
Example: Logging in at Lumbridge. Then by changing it, you will Log in at Varrock.

Go to SRC/Server/Config.Java.
Search for public static final int START_LOCATION_X It should be self explanatory after that.

Magic-Book Change (Same File): Search Teleport Spells
Then just find the name of the Home.
Note: It may not say “Home”, the file may actually call it for example Lumbridge instead of “Home”.

Read full topic
